prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon that has a long neck and a frosty mane.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a dinosaur with blue scales and icy spikes.
Generate a creature that is both majestic and has a serene presence, with light blue hues.
Design a Pokemon that can thrive in snowy mountains and has features like a tail and icy breath.
Show me a quadruped Pokemon that has a playful demeanor and glows with icy energy.
Make a large, blue Pokemon that has a unique icy crest on its head and a gentle nature.
I want a majestic ice-type Pokemon that looks like it could be a guardian of ancient mountains.
